tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.tipCountAfter: Token (The list only shows part of tokens. Other tokens could be found by searching contract address.)

packing.title: Plz wait, your transaction is packing

notFound.title: There’s nothing here!
notFound.label: Sorry! This is an invalid search string.
notFound.addressTip: If you are searching Conflux address, it should start with 0x0 (built-in contract), 0x1 (user account), or 0x8 (smart contract).

sponsor.title: Contract Sponsor
sponsor.providedStorage: Storage Fees Provided By Conflux Foundation
sponsor.providedGas: Gas Fees Provided By Conflux Foundation
sponsor.availStorage: Remaining Storage Fees By Conflux Foundation
sponsor.availGas: Remaining Gas Fees By Conflux Foundation
sponsor.noticeFirst: Each contract has a maximum of 5 sponsorship opportunities. The sponsor will provide a storage fee of 500cfx and a gas fee of up to 100cfx.
sponsor.noticeSecond: For the first application, you need to connect to conflux portal to confirm that you are the contract manager; after the connection is completed, click apply again to get sponsorship.
sponsor.noticeThirdOne: If you have not installed confluxportal in your browser, please enter
sponsor.errReachToMax: The available balance storage fees or gas fees has reached or exceeded the maximum value
sponsor.errInsufficientFee: Insufficient storage fees or gas fees by Conflux Foundation
sponsor.errReplaceThird: Unable to replace the third-party sponsors of storage or gas fees
